description:
Kozakura Shion is a 1/2 Medusa.
Her ability is "Staring Eyes", which allows her to temporarily stop the movement of whomever meets her gaze. A power which http://anidb.net/ch63167 [Marry] inherited. Unlike her daughter, she`s actually capable of turning people into stone, but doing so causes such strain to her body that it would kill her.
name: Kozakura Shion
